attributes.content: Masaka City aims to be a highly livable and vibrant agro-economic hub with prosperous residents. Its mission is to provide coordinated, affordable, and accessible services for sustainable livelihoods. Situated 130 km southwest of Kampala, Masaka City spans 362.41 square kilometers, with a population of about 211,591.

attributes.content: SETA (Sector Education and Training Authority) | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: SETAs, or Sector Education and Training Authorities, were re-established on March 3, 2005, by Minister of Labour Membathisi Mdladlana to implement the National Skills Development Strategy and enhance skills across various sectors. The Services SETA is dedicated to advancing skills development through programs like learnerships, skills programs, and internships. It provides grants to employers and training providers to boost the skills of both employed and unemployed individuals, and oversees occupation-based training as delegated by the Quality Council for Trades and Occupations (QCTO).

body.value: SETAs, or Sector Education and Training Authorities, were re-established on March 3, 2005, by Minister of Labour Membathisi Mdladlana to implement the National Skills Development Strategy and enhance skills across various sectors. The Services SETA is dedicated to advancing skills development through programs like learnerships, skills programs, and internships. It provides grants to employers and training providers to boost the skills of both employed and unemployed individuals, and oversees occupation-based training as delegated by the Quality Council for Trades and Occupations (QCTO). With the services sector employing over 3 million people and significantly contributing to South Africa's GDP, the Services SETA bridges the gap between formal education and workplace needs by partnering with public and private institutions to deliver essential training. Its vision is a thriving services sector that fosters economic growth and inclusive opportunities for all South Africans, and its mission is to facilitate quality skills development for employment and entrepreneurship, thereby supporting national economic growth.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: The Harry Gwala District Municipality, located in southwestern KwaZulu-Natal and covering 11,127.9 square kilometers, encompasses five local municipalities: Ubuhlebezwe, Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, Greater Kokstad, and Umzimkhulu. Formed as District Municipality DC43, it emerged from the Joint Services Boards and Transitional Regional Councils established during apartheid to improve rural service delivery. Following the 2000 Local Government Elections, the municipality's boundaries were redefined to integrate parts of former councils and establish new municipalities.

body.value: The Harry Gwala District Municipality, located in southwestern KwaZulu-Natal and covering 11,127.9 square kilometers, encompasses five local municipalities: Ubuhlebezwe, Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, Greater Kokstad, and Umzimkhulu. Formed as District Municipality DC43, it emerged from the Joint Services Boards and Transitional Regional Councils established during apartheid to improve rural service delivery. Following the 2000 Local Government Elections, the municipality's boundaries were redefined to integrate parts of former councils and establish new municipalities. Initially grappling with significant challenges such as inadequate funding and resources, the municipality began to stabilize and enhance its operations under the leadership of Municipal Manager Mr. N. M. Mabaso by October 2001, showing progress in its development despite early obstacles.

Headquartered in Grahamstown with an additional office in East London, CES operates with staff located across several South African cities and in Maputo, Mozambique. The company prides itself on continuity with long-serving employees and its founding partner, Dr. Ted Avis, and now primarily operates remotely post-Covid. For more details on their services, visit their website and connect through the provided contact informatio

attributes.content: The eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality, located in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, encompasses Durban, the province's largest city and the third-largest in the country. Known for its hilly terrain and lack of a true coastal plain, eThekwini is a sophisticated, cosmopolitan area. It boasts Africa's busiest port and the prestigious International Convention Centre, which has hosted numerous global events. Durban's history includes early conflicts between ivory hunters and local Zulu monarchs.

body.value: The eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality, located in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, encompasses Durban, the province's largest city and the third-largest in the country. Known for its hilly terrain and lack of a true coastal plain, eThekwini is a sophisticated, cosmopolitan area. It boasts Africa's busiest port and the prestigious International Convention Centre, which has hosted numerous global events. Durban's history includes early conflicts between ivory hunters and local Zulu monarchs. The city's warm, subtropical climate and extensive beaches make it a major tourist destination, with an estimated 9.95 million visitors in 2010/11. Domestic tourism significantly impacts the region's GDP, contributing around 8% annually. The hospitality sector features a range of hotels, nightlife, shopping, ethnic attractions, traditional villages, craft markets, dams, and game parks.

body.value:
IPEC is a consulting engineering company that provides comprehensive civil and structural engineering services for high-end construction and infrastructure projects across the Middle East, Europe, and Africa. Established in 2006 in Beirut, Lebanon, IPEC has grown into a dynamic, multi-disciplinary firm that delivers high-quality, cost-effective solutions.

Core Services:

Feasibility Studies: Conducting in-depth analyses to determine the viability of proposed projects.
Concept Design: Developing initial design ideas that form the basis of the project.
Preliminary & Detailed Design: Creating detailed plans and specifications required for project execution.
Preparation of Tender Documents: Compiling documents needed for the bidding process.
Design Review and Value Engineering: Evaluating designs to enhance value and reduce costs without compromising quality.
Quality Control and Site Supervision: Ensuring that construction meets specified standards and is completed according to the design.
Areas of Expertise:

Industrial Developments: Designing and overseeing the construction of factories, warehouses, and other industrial facilities.
Residential & Commercial Developments: Providing engineering services for the construction of homes, office buildings, and retail spaces.
Hotels & Leisure Facilities: Designing structures for the hospitality and leisure industry.
Infrastructure Projects: Developing essential infrastructure such as water supply systems, sewage networks, and power plants.
Roads: Planning and supervising the construction and maintenance of road networks.

attributes.title: Nigerian Content Development and Monitoring Board

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: Nigerian Content Development and Monitoring Board | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Established in 2010 under the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry Content Development (NOGICD) Act, the Nigerian Content Development and Monitoring Board (NCDMB) oversees the implementation and monitoring of Nigerian Content regulations. Its responsibilities include:

body.value:
Established in 2010 under the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry Content Development (NOGICD) Act, the Nigerian Content Development and Monitoring Board (NCDMB) oversees the implementation and monitoring of Nigerian Content regulations. Its responsibilities include:

  • Reviewing and approving Nigerian Content plans.
  • Setting guidelines and minimum content levels for oil and gas projects.
  • Promoting capacity building in human capital, infrastructure, and local supplier development.
  • Managing the Nigerian Content Development Fund.
  • Operating the Joint Qualification System (NOGICJQS) with industry partners.
  • Monitoring compliance with Nigerian Content requirements, including spending, employment, and local sourcing.
  • Awarding Certificates of Authorization for compliant projects.
  • Conducting research, training, and workshops to advance Nigerian Content development.
body.processed:
Established in 2010 under the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry Content Development (NOGICD) Act, the Nigerian Content Development and Monitoring Board (NCDMB) oversees the implementation and monitoring of Nigerian Content regulations. Its responsibilities include:

  • Promoting capacity building in human capital, infrastructure, and local supplier development.

attributes.content: The government of the People's Republic of China is based on a system of people's congress within the parameters of a unitary communist state, in which the ruling Chinese Communist Party (CCP) enacts its policies through people's congresses. This system is based on the principle of unified state power, in which the legislature, the National People's Congress (NPC), is constitutionally enshrined as "the highest state organ of power." As China's political system has no separation of powers, there is only one branch of government which is represented by the legislature.

attributes.content: Saldanha Bay Municipality (WC014) lies on South Africa's West Coast, around 140 kilometers north of Cape Town, forming a vital part of the West Coast District Municipality (DC1) within the Western Cape Province. Bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the west, Bergrivier Municipality to the north, and Swartland Municipality to the east, it spans 2015 km with a 238 km coastline. The municipality's main office is in Vredenburg, complemented by satellite offices in Hopefield, St Helena Bay, Paternoster, Saldanha, and Langebaan.

body.value: Saldanha Bay Municipality (WC014) lies on South Africa's West Coast, around 140 kilometers north of Cape Town, forming a vital part of the West Coast District Municipality (DC1) within the Western Cape Province. The municipality's main office is in Vredenburg, complemented by satellite offices in Hopefield, St Helena Bay, Paternoster, Saldanha, and Langebaan. attributes.content: SOLA is a leading firm with extensive expertise in the development, design, construction, and operation of solar PV plants. They have successfully developed over 2750 MW of solar solutions for commercial and industrial clients. SOLA offers comprehensive engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services tailored to various energy needs. Their operations and maintenance services include advanced monitoring and reporting, allowing clients to track energy savings and return on investment while ensuring consistent delivery of clean energy.
